abstract: It’s hard to imagine anyone reading about the latest Zune models from Microsoft and putting them at the top of their Christmas wish list.
snippet: It’s hard to imagine anyone reading about the latest Zune models from Microsoft and putting them at the top of their Christmas wish list.
lead_paragraph: It’s hard to imagine anyone reading the reports of the second generation of Microsoft’s Zune audio player and deciding it should go at the top of their Christmas wish list.
